text: ovun kerehi (mema dharmaya) samudiranaya kara penvanu læbuvahot eyata ovun “meyada api visvasa karannemu. niyata vasayenma meyada apage deviyange sannidhanayen pæmini satya (dharmaya) vanneya. mita pera niyata vasayenma api (meya apage dharmaya magin dænagena, sampurnayenma avanata vu) muslimvarun vasayen sitiyemu” yayi pavasannaha
